action.text: if exists(select 1 from dmkh where ma_kh = @ma_kh) begin select rtrim(a.tk) as tk, rtrim(b.ten_tk%l) as ten_tk%l, rtrim(a.ma_tt) as ma_tt, rtrim(c.ten_tt%l) as ten_tt%l, rtrim(doi_tac) as ong_ba, rtrim(a.dia_chi) as dia_chi, rtrim(a.ma_so_thue) as ma_so_thue, rtrim(a.tk_nh) as tk_nh, rtrim(a.ngan_hang) as ngan_hang, rtrim(a.tinh_thanh) as tinh_thanh, rtrim(chi_nhanh) as chi_nhanh, rtrim(quoc_gia) as quoc_gia, rtrim(ma_nh_dt) as ma_nh_dt from dmkh a left join dmtk b on a.tk = b.tk left join dmtt c on a.ma_tt = c.ma_tt where a.ma_kh = @ma_kh return end
